item.title: 侏罗纪世界》和主题公园的蓬勃发展使康卡斯特第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast）周四公布的季度业绩超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于其主题公园越来越受欢迎，以及最新电影《侏罗纪世界》（Jurassic World）带来的强劲票房回报。【原文：Comcast surpassed Wall Street expectations for quarterly results on Thursday, thanks to the growing popularity of its theme parks and strong box office returns from its latest "Jurassic World" movie.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对58.36万辆存在安全问题的本田汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）对约58.36万辆本田汽车的后排安全带警告和安全气囊意外展开的潜在缺陷分别展开了调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) has launched separate investigations into about 583,600 Honda vehicles over potential defects involving rear seatbelt warnings and inadvertent airbag deployments.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动数据中心需求增长，施耐德电气内生增长超出预期
item.description: 周四，施耐德电气的有机收入增长超过了季度预期，这主要得益于人工智能数据中心需求的激增，这家法国工业集团正在巩固其作为该行业主要供应商的地位。【原文：Schneider Electric's organic revenue growth beat quarterly estimates on Thursday, propelled by surging demand for data centres that power artificial intelligence, as the French industrial group cements its role as a key supplier for the sector.】

item.title: 礼来上调全年业绩预期，减肥药需求推动第三季度业绩增长
item.description: 礼来公司周四上调了全年利润和收入预期，原因是其广受欢迎的减肥药和糖尿病药物Zepbound和Mounjaro的强劲需求帮助其第三季度盈利超过预期。【原文：Eli Lilly raised its full-year profit and revenue forecast on Thursday as strong appetite for its widely popular weight-loss and diabetes drugs Zepbound and Mounjaro helped it beat third-quarter earnings estimates.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称有信心特朗普与习近平进行良好会谈
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋周四表示，他相信美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国领导人习近平当天早些时候在韩国会晤期间进行了良好的对话。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday he was confident that U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping had a good conversation during a meeting in South Korea earlier in the day.】

item.title: 金佰利公司季度销售额超出预期，原因是家用主食需求保持稳定
item.description: 周四，Huggies 纸尿裤制造商金佰利-克拉克公司的第三季度销售额超过了分析师的预期，原因是疲于通胀的消费者倾向于购买其经济实惠的主食。【原文：Huggies diaper maker Kimberly-Clark topped analysts' estimates for third-quarter sales on Thursday, as inflation-weary consumers gravitated toward its affordable staples.】

item.title: 由于炼油利润率提高，HF Sinclair 第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 炼油商 HF Sinclair 周四公布的第三季度调整后利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于炼油利润率的提高和中游业务的强劲表现，股价在盘前交易中上涨了 1%。【原文：Refiner HF Sinclair beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter adjusted profit on Thursday, helped by improvement in refining margins and strength in its midstream segment, sending shares up 1% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 默克第三季度销售额增长，原因是 Keytruda 的增长抵消了加德西的下降
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co）周四公布第三季度收入增长，原因是其癌症治疗大片 Keytruda 的增长抵消了人乳头瘤病毒疫苗加卫苗（Gardasil）在中国销售额的下降。【原文：Merck & Co on Thursday posted higher third quarter revenue as growth from its blockbuster cancer drug Keytruda offset falling sales from human papillomavirus vaccine Gardasil in China.】

item.title: 汉堡王母公司公布的销售增长强于预期，原因是需求恢复强劲
item.description: Restaurant Brands 周四公布的第三季度可比销售额高于预期，这主要得益于其连锁餐厅汉堡王（Burger King）和蒂姆-霍顿斯（Tim Hortons）的客流量回升。【原文：Restaurant Brands reported third-quarter comparable sales above estimates on Thursday, helped by resilient traffic at the its restaurant chains Burger King and Tim Hortons.】

item.title: 内部备忘录显示，澳航数字与客户主管在网络漏洞发生数月后辞职
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份内部备忘录，澳航首席客户和数字官卡特里娜-拉里特（Catriona Larritt）将于 12 月底卸任。【原文：Qantas's chief customer and digital officer ‌Catriona Larritt will step down by the end of December, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday, months after the airline faced one of Australia's biggest cyber breaches in years.】

item.title: 仍未达成关税协议的台湾在亚太经合组织会议上与美国进行贸易谈判
item.description: 台湾最高贸易谈判代表周四表示，她在韩国亚太经合组织峰会期间会见了一位美国高级贸易官员，但无法提供双方讨论的任何细节。【原文：Taiwan's top trade negotiator said on Thursday that she had met with a senior U.S. trade official on the sidelines of the APEC summit in South Korea, but could not provide any details of what they discussed.】

item.title: 瑞典人工智能初创公司 Legora 以 18 亿美元估值融资 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的法律人工智能初创公司 Legora 周四表示，该公司已筹集到 1.5 亿美元资金，估值达 18 亿美元，本轮融资由 Bessemer Venture Partners、ICONIQ、General Catalyst 和 Y Combinator 等风险投资公司参与。【原文：Sweden-based legal AI startup Legora said on Thursday it has raised $150 million, valuing the company at $1.8 billion in a funding round by venture capital firms such as Bessemer Venture Partners, ICONIQ, General Catalyst and Y Combinator.】

item.title: 美国零售商对好时糖果打折，以促进万圣节的主要销售额
item.description: 数据显示，由于关税和可可通胀导致成本上升，好时糖果制造商提高了价格，因此在好时最大的节日万圣节到来之前，美国零售商为好时商品提供了更多折扣。【原文：U.S. retailers are offering more discounts on Hershey goods ahead of its biggest holiday, Halloween, according to data, as the candymaker hiked prices due to rising costs from tariffs and cocoa inflation.】

item.title: 等待巴西贸易协议的美国咖啡烘焙商抢购咖啡库存
item.description: 美国的咖啡烘焙商在等待美巴贸易谈判结果的同时，也在清理他们的库存，谈判结果可能决定他们是否需要为替代咖啡来源支付更高的价格。【原文：Coffee roasters in the United States are plowing through their stockpiles as they await the outcome of ongoing U.S.-Brazil trade negotiations, talks that could determine whether they have to pay much higher prices for alternative sources of coffee.】

item.title: 旅游科技公司纳凡 9.23 亿美元美国首次公开募股后将在纳斯达克上市
item.description: Navan 将于本周四晚些时候在纳斯达克首次亮相，此前这家旅游技术公司在上市时筹集了 9.23 亿美元，并成功避开了美国政府停摆而上市。【原文：Navan is set to make its Nasdaq debut later on Thursday, after the travel technology company raised $923 million in its listing and successfully navigated a U.S. government shutdown to go public.】

item.title: 欧洲央行希望在 2027 年启动数字欧元试点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周四表示，如果能及时获得立法者的批准，它可能会在2027年推出数字货币试点，因为它认为这个项目对欧元区的金融自治至关重要。【原文：The European Central Bank said on Thursday it could launch a pilot of its digital currency in 2027 provided it can secure timely approval from lawmakers for a project it deems vital for the euro zone's financial autonomy.】

item.title: 美联储为市场增添变数，12 月减息成疑
item.description: 投资者寄希望于未来会有更多的货币政策放松，即使周三的美联储会议显示，在数据荒、通胀胶着以及央行成员意见分歧的情况下，通往更多降息的道路并不那么确定。【原文：Investors were pinning hopes on more monetary policy easing ahead, even as Wednesday's Federal Reserve meeting revealed a less-certain path toward more interest rate cuts in the face of a data drought, sticky inflation and divided opinions among the central bank's members.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因美联储不确定性和大型科技公司财报而停滞不前
item.description: 华尔街期货周四在创纪录水平附近停滞不前，因为交易员们正在消化美国降息前景的缓和、一连串大型科技公司的财报以及新宣布的中美贸易协议。【原文：Wall Street futures stalled near record levels on Thursday, as traders digested a tempered U.S. rate-cut outlook, a spate of Big Tech earnings and a newly announced U.S.–China trade deal.】

item.title: 特朗普的韩国贸易协议再次引发对货币外逃的担忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统与韩国签订的贸易协定可能会对韩元造成重大打击，因为现金开始流出韩国以支付在美国的投资承诺，尽管该协定可能会对 Kospi 指数带来利好。【原文：President Donald Trump's trade pact with South Korea could deal a major blow to the won when cash starts flowing out of the country to cover investment commitments in the U.S., though the pact will likely be a boon for the Kospi.】

item.title: 科技领军企业加大人工智能支出，但 Alphabet 的现金流赢得投资者青睐
item.description: 周三，美国最大的三家科技公司都表示计划在明年加快资本支出，但投资者最认可的是谷歌母公司 Alphabet 利用现金流为其计划提供资金的能力。【原文：Three of the biggest U.S. technology companies flagged plans on Wednesday to accelerate capital spending over the next year but investors were most accepting of Google-parent Alphabet's ability to fund its plans from its cash flow.】

item.title: 英国维珍媒体 O2 与马斯克的 Starlink 公司签署了农村覆盖协议
item.description: 英国维珍媒体 O2 公司表示，它已与埃隆-马斯克的 Starlink 公司签署了一项协议，以提高农村地区的移动通信覆盖率，在 2026 年上半年启动时首先提供信息和数据服务。【原文：Britain's Virgin Media O2 said it had signed a deal with Elon Musk's Starlink to boost mobile coverage in rural areas, initially with messaging and data services when it launches in the first half of 2026.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，因越野灯条问题，特斯拉在美国召回近 6,200 辆 Cybertrucks
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周四表示，特斯拉将在美国召回6197辆Cybertrucks，原因是脱落的灯杆可能掉落，对其他车辆造成道路危险。【原文：Tesla is recalling 6,197 Cybertrucks in the United States because a detached light bar could fall and pose a road hazard to other vehicles, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃达丰将以 2.04 亿美元收购德国云计算专家 Skaylink
item.description: 英国沃达丰公司（Vodafone）周四表示，将以1.75亿欧元（2.0409亿美元）的价格从私募股权公司沃特兰德（Waterland）手中收购德国云计算和数字化转型公司Skaylink，以扩大其服务范围。【原文：Britain's Vodafone on Thursday said it will acquire German cloud and digital transformation firm Skaylink for 175 million euros ($204.09 million) from private equity firm Waterland, in a push to expand its service offerings.】

item.title: 松下下调全年利润预期，原因是汽车电池业务前景黯淡
item.description: 日本松下控股公司周四将全年营业利润预期下调了13.5%，主要原因是为特斯拉和其他汽车制造商供应电池的关键能源部门的利润预计将减少。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Holdings cut its full-year operating profit forecast by 13.5% on Thursday, mainly due to an expected decrease in profit at its key energy unit, which supplies batteries to Tesla and other automakers.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯股价大涨，北美市场回暖推动第三季度利润强劲增长
item.description: 伊莱克斯第三季度的利润增长了一倍多，这主要得益于其北美业务的复苏，以及该公司对美国关税相关成本的控制，从而使其股价大幅上涨。【原文：Electrolux's profit more than doubled in the third quarter, driven by a recovery in its North American business and as it mostly managed costs related to U.S. tariffs, sending its shares up sharply.】

item.title: 旅游科技公司纳凡首次公开募股融资约 9.23 亿美元
item.description: 企业差旅和费用公司纳凡周三将其首次公开募股定价为每股 25 美元，在每股 24 美元至 26 美元的市场区间内，募集资金约 9.231 亿美元，加强了新股发行的强劲势头。【原文：Corporate travel and expense company Navan on Wednesday priced its initial public offering at $25 per share, within its marketed range of $24 to $26 per share, raising about $923.1 million and reinforcing a strong momentum for fresh flotations.】

item.title: 微软正在调查 M365 云和 Office.com 的访问问题
item.description: 微软公司周三表示，他们正在调查 Microsoft 365 云和 Office.com 无法访问的问题。【原文：Microsoft said on Wednesday they are investigating an issue in which Microsoft 365 Cloud and Office.com were reported to be inaccessible.】

item.title: 丰田公司首席执行官表示，Nexperia 芯片不会立即出现短缺
item.description: 丰田汽车公司首席执行官佐藤浩二（Koji Sato）表示，最近中国对芯片制造商 Nexperia 实施出口限制，丰田汽车不会立即面临芯片短缺问题，尽管该日本汽车制造商正在密切关注生产风险。【原文：Toyota Motor does not face an immediate chip shortage from recent Chinese export restrictions related to chipmaker Nexperia, even as the Japanese automaker is carefully watching risks to production, Chief Executive Koji Sato said.】

item.title: 市场关注中美贸易谈判，油价变化不大
item.description: 周四早盘，油价守住了上一交易日的大部分涨幅，因为投资者在等待当天晚些时候举行的中美贸易谈判，希望有迹象表明给经济增长前景蒙上阴影的紧张局势将得到缓解。【原文：Oil prices held on to most gains from the previous session in early trading on Thursday as investors awaited U.S.-China trade talks later in the day, hoping for signs that tensions clouding the economic growth outlook will ease.】

item.title: 环球音乐与人工智能公司 Udio 就版权纠纷达成和解
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周三表示，已与人工智能公司 Udio 就版权侵权案达成和解，两家公司将合作开发一套新的创意产品。【原文：Universal Music Group said on Wednesday it has settled a copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence company Udio and that the two firms will collaborate on a new suite of creative products.】
